LogicalTable.name: D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)
LogicalTable.Description: This logical table contains the attribute columns that are present in the Revenue fact table which are not measure columns but can be used as attributes in the report. All the columns in this table are physically mapped to columns in the Revenue fact table, or are derived calculations from these objects.

LogicalColumn.name: Order Number
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Number from the Revenue Facts table

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Number"

LogicalColumn.name: Order Status
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Status value from the Revenue Facts table. Naturally drills into Orders Number Column.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Status"

LogicalColumn.name: Order Type
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Type value from the Revenue Facts table. Naturally drills into Orders Status Column.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Type"

LogicalColumn.name: Order Size Bin
LogicalColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets the order by their size (revenue per order). The calculation is done on the fly by OBIEE server and results in 5 buckets.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprText: case when "%1" <1000 then 'Below 1k' when "%1" <2000 then 'Between 1k and 2k' when "%1" <3000 then 'Between 2k and 3k' when "%1" <5000 then 'Between 3k and 5k' else 'Over 5k' end
Expr.ExprTextDesc: case when ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Revenue" <1000 then 'Below 1k' when ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Revenue" <2000 then 'Between 1k and 2k' when ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Revenue" <3000 then 'Between 2k and 3k' when ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Revenue" <5000 then 'Between 3k and 5k' else 'Over 5k' end

LogicalColumn.name: Order to Bill Days
LogicalColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that computes for ech order, the number of days between order date and bill date.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Order Date", ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Billed Date")

LogicalColumn.name: Order to Bill Days Bin
LogicalColumn.Description: This is a logical calculation object that buckets each order into a group, based on the number of days between order date and bill date. The calculation is done on the fly by BIEE server.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprText: CASE WHEN "%1" < 10 THEN 'Below 10' WHEN "%1" < 15 THEN 'Between 10 and 15' WHEN "%1" < 20 THEN 'Between 15 and 20' ELSE 'Over 20' END
Expr.ExprTextDesc: CASE WHEN ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Order to Bill Days" < 10 THEN 'Below 10' WHEN ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Order to Bill Days" < 15 THEN 'Between 10 and 15' WHEN ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Order to Bill Days" < 20 THEN 'Between 15 and 20' ELSE 'Over 20' END

LogicalColumn.name: Order Date
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This field is of type Date.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Day_Dt"

LogicalColumn.name: Order Month
LogicalColumn.Description: Extracts the month out of the the Oder Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: Month( ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Day_Dt")

LogicalColumn.name: Order Year
LogicalColumn.Description: Extracts the year out of the the Oder Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: Year( ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Order_Day_Dt")

LogicalColumn.name: Billed Date
LogicalColumn.Description: Returns the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This field is of type Date.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: ". - Sample App Lite Data"."".""."F10 Revenue Facts (Order grain)"."Bill_Day_Dt"

LogicalColumn.name: Billed Month
LogicalColumn.Description: Extracts the month out of the the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: EXTRACT( MONTH FROM ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Billed Date")

LogicalColumn.name: Billed Year
LogicalColumn.Description: Extracts the year out of the the Oder Bill Date value from the Revenue Facts table. This information is extracted by BIEE server.

Expr.name: Expr
Expr.ExprTextDesc: EXTRACT( YEAR FROM ". - SampleApp Lite1"."D3 Orders (Facts Attributes)"."Billed Date")
